templateData.kat:
The Rat Pet can have its rarity upgraded from {{Legendary}} all the way up to {{Mythic}} by Kat. When upgrading [[Pets]] through Kat the pet will keep all of its Pet Experience. However due to the scaling EXP needed the pet will lose some [[Pets#Leveling|Pet Levels]] depending on the new rarity. Kat will reduce the amount of {{Coins}} needed per level of the Pet. This discount is {{color|green|0.3%}} per level of the base price. {{Kat Cost |cost_legendary_level_1 = {{Coins|1,000,000}}
1 [[File:SkyBlock_items_rat_jetpack.png|25px|link=Rat Jetpack]] [[Rat Jetpack]] |cost_legendary_level_100 = {{Coins|700,000}}
1 [[File:SkyBlock_items_rat_jetpack.png|25px|link=Rat Jetpack]] [[Rat Jetpack]] |time_legendary = 1 Hour }}
